titleStmt.title: The Army's declaration: being a true alarum in ansvver to a false and fiery one made lately by a member of that destable [sic] Rump and printed for Livewell Chapman. By a member of the Army now in London.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for prevention of sedition and mutiny,

notesStmt.note: A reply to an untraced work.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
